title: Peacock Springs Ranch
description: Can a gay man find love on a ranch in Central Utah? On a ranch that was started by a Mormon family trying to preserve polygamy, another kind of marriage the society didn't want to acknowledge?A veterinarian/rancher and his only son trying to keep the ranch going, and to keep their family on the land made sacred by Mormon history and a Native American legend--but it seems like Michael has given up. But maybe life hasn't given up on him...
author: Jonathan Stowers
